title: Waterfall Hiking Tour

description: With a perfect mix of culture, nature, and adventure, our Panama adventure tours have it all… Visits to the most beautiful and interesting destinations in the country, off the beaten path exploration, multiple fun activities along the route, flexibility to customize, great food, carefully selected small hotels and B&B’s, and full support from our friendly and experienced guides, making sure you don’t miss a thing and you make the most out of your vacation.

images.title: Dip your feet in the beautiful glacial lake of Humantay
Visit the lesser-known picturesque ruins of Llactapata
Explore the fabled sanctuary of Machu Picchu
Cross over the 4660m Salkantay pass before descending into the cloud forest
